metadata.title: Wireless WiFi Magnetic Door Window Sensor Support for Alexa Google Home for Tuya
features: 【Enjoy Your Smart Life】: When you leave home, it will send you a notification message when a door / window is opened or closed, so that you can find intruders in time. Also, you can share the device with your family and keep track of the sensor activity history. You can detect the status of opening / closing doors / windows through the mobile app anytime, anywhere.

【Compatible with Alexa and Google Home】: Just use your voice to control devices connected through Google Home / Alexa. Other smart devices compatible with Smart Life or IFTTT can also be used for automatic control. Convenient for you to detect doors, windows, cabinets, drawers or anywhere you want to be notified when opening or closing.

【Easy to Install】: No complicated installation tools required. Simply attach the burglar alarm to the door / window, and the firm tape (included) helps you securely secure the access alarm remote somewhere. The Smart Life app can be downloaded from GooglePlay or App Store to add devices to make it easier to detect door / window status.

【Quick and Instant Alarm】: It can work in the 2.4G Wi-Fi network, both in the smart access point and in Tuya. When an abnormal condition is detected, an instant alarm notification will be sent to the phone via the APP within 3-10 seconds. Supports sabotage alarm and low battery alarm. Helps improve family safety and child safety.

【Wide Range of Applications】: Smart doors and windows can be used to build smart automated security systems in homes or public areas, or work alone without a network. Powered by 2 AAA batteries (not included), the standby time is up to 1 year. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us for replacement or refund. We guarantee 100% satisfaction.
description: Transmitter Size: Approx.69.5x24mm/2.7x0.9in Magnetic Strip Size: Approx.40.5x14.8x16mm/1.59x0.58x0.63in

Battery: AAA1.5V x 2 (not included) Standby Current: ≤5uA Alarm Current: ≤160uA Low Point Undervoltage: ≤2.7V Magnetic Control Distance: ≥15mm Protocol: IEEE 802.11b / g / n Operating Temperature: -10℃-40℃(14F-104F) Humidity: 20% -85% Storage Temperature: -10℃-60℃ (14F-140F) Storage Humidity: 0% -90% Standby Time: 6-12 months Wireless Type: 2.4 GHz
1 x Wifi Door And Window Sensor (1 x Wireless Transmitter, 1 x Magnetic Strip) 2 x Adhesive Sticker 1 x Pack of Screws 1 x Instruction Manual
